Zone defense is a type of defense, used in team sports, which is the alternative to 
man-to-man defense; instead of each player guarding a corresponding player on 
the other team, each defensive player is given an area known as a "zone" to 
cover. A zone defense can be used in virtually all sports where defensive players 
... For example, in a 23 zone two defenders are covering areas in the top of...
